mapper.select: SELECT B.record_id, A.book_cover, A.book_title, A.book_writer, A.book_pub, B.record_init_date, B.record_fin_date, B.record_score, B.record_contents FROM BOOK A, ( SELECT * FROM RECORD WHERE user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY record_date DESC LIMIT #{start}, 12 ) B WHERE A.book_id = B.book_id
SELECT * FROM BOOK WHERE (book_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR book_writer LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) AND available = 0 LIMIT #{start}, 3

SELECT B.record_id, A.book_cover, A.book_title, A.book_writer, A.book_pub, B.record_init_date, B.record_fin_date, B.record_score, B.record_contents FROM BOOK A, RECORD B WHERE A.book_id = B.book_id AND B.record_id = #{record_id}
